exceptions.tactic: intros Y X f ll n m H.
intros Y' X f ll n m H.
intros Y' X' f ll n m H.
intros Y' X' f' ll n m H.
intros Y' X' f' ll' n m H.
intros Y' X' f' ll' n' m H.
intros Y' X' f' ll' n' m' H.

exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "map ?M1425 (?M1426 ++ ?M1427)" in H.

original: intros Y X f ll n m H. unfold map in H. rewrite map_app in H. apply map_eq_app in H as [l1 [l2 [H1 [H2 H3]]]]. exists l1. exists l2. split. - rewrite <- app_assoc_reverse in H1. apply H1. - split. + apply H2. + apply H3.
